FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: “Yawgmoth,” Freyalise whispered as she set the bomb, “now you will pay for your treachery.”
« Yaugzebul » murmura Freyalise en enclenchant la bombe, « tu vas maintenant payer pour ta traîtrise. »
“‘Yawgmoth’, susurró Freyalise al poner la bomba, ‘ahora pagarás por tu traición’.”
„Yawgmoth“, flüsterte Freyalise, als sie die Bombe scharf machte, „jetzt wirst du für deinen Verrat bezahlen.“
"Yawgmoth", sussurrò Freyalise mentre piazzava la bomba, "adesso pagherai per il tuo tradimento."
「さあヨーグモス」と、フレイアリーズは爆弾を仕掛けながらつぶやいた。「裏切りの報いを受けるときがきたわよ」
프레얄리스가 폭탄을 설치하며 속삭였다. “야그모쓰, 이제 배신의 대가를 치를 시간이다.”
«Явгмот,— прошептала Фрейализ, устанавливая бомбу,— сейчас ты заплатишь за предательство».
“Yawgmoth”, Freyalise suspirou enquanto ajustava a bomba, “agora irás pagar por tua traição.”

ACTIVATED_ABILITY.FILTER: return FilteredCard() ~= nil and FilteredCard():GetZone() == ( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) and FilteredCard():GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_ARTIFACT ) ~= 0 or FilteredCard():GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) ~= 0 or FilteredCard():GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_ENCHANTMENT ) ~= 0
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local card = FilteredCard() local threshold = GetEffectX() if card ~= nil then n = card:GetConvertedManaCost() if n < (threshold+1) then card:Destroy() end end
